p1.title: What is Aouis?
p1.text: Aouis is an online platform that allows users to buy and sell a wide variety of products and services, such as used cars, furniture, clothing, jobs, and even real estate rentals.

p2.title: How does it work?
p2.text: It functions like a classified ads marketplace where users can post their ads for free, interact with buyers or sellers through messages, and conclude transactions in person or online.
